verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] virtually holding America hostage over his border wall , even going so far as to threaten a government shutdown if Democrats did n't agree to it .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] is [ARGM-ADV: virtually] [V: holding] [ARG1: America] [ARGM-ADV: hostage over his border wall] , [ARGM-ADV: even going so far as to threaten a government shutdown if Democrats did n't agree to it] .
[ARG1: Donald Trump] is virtually holding America hostage over his border wall , [ARGM-ADV: even] [V: going] [ARG4: so far as to threaten a government shutdown if Democrats did n't agree to it] .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] is virtually holding America hostage over his border wall , even going so far as to [V: threaten] [ARG1: a government shutdown] [ARGM-ADV: if Democrats did n't agree to it] .
Donald Trump is virtually holding America hostage over his border wall , even going so far as to threaten a government shutdown if Democrats [V: did] n't agree to it .
Donald Trump is virtually holding America hostage over his border wall , even going so far as to threaten a government shutdown if [ARG0: Democrats] did [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: agree] [ARG1: to it] .
